ComicInfo.Summary: The Spider-Man/Deadpool Ho-Ho-Holiday Special!: The Roman god Saturn is not pleased with the state of modern-day Christmas and goes on a violent rampage.
ComicInfo.Title: The Spider-Man/Deadpool Ho-Ho-Holiday Special!
